verses.verse: That <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> as the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H5221>conquered<s%> <S%H5804>Gaza.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord:<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> are going to <S%H5927>rise<s%> from the <S%H6828>north<s%> And <S%H1961>become<s%> an <S%H7857>overflowing<s%> <S%H5158>torrent,<s%> And <S%H7857>overflow<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> and <S%H4393>all<s%> its <S%H4393>fulness,<s%> The <S%H5892>city<s%> and those who <S%H3427>live<s%> in it; And the <S%H120>men<s%> will <S%H2199>cry<s%> out, And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> will <S%H3213>wail.<s%>

<S%H4480>"Because<s%> of the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H8161>galloping<s%> <S%H6541>hoofs<s%> of his <S%H47>stallions,<s%> The <S%H7494>tumult<s%> of his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> [and] the <S%H1995>rumbling<s%> of his <S%H1534>wheels,<s%> The fathers have not <S%H1>turned<s%> <S%H6437>back<s%> for [their] <S%H6437>children,<s%> <S%H1121>Because<s%> of the <S%H4480>limpness<s%> of [their] <S%H7510>hands,<s%>

On <S%H5921>account<s%> of the <S%H3117>day<s%> that is <S%H935>coming<s%> To <S%H7703>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> To <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> and <S%H6721>Sidon<s%> <S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H5826>ally<s%> that is <S%H8300>left;<s%> For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is going to <S%H7703>destroy<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> The <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H339>coastland<s%> of <S%H3731>Caphtor.<s%>

<S%H7144>"Baldness<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H5804>Gaza;<s%> <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> has been <S%H1820>ruined.<s%> O <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of their <S%H6010>valley,<s%> <S%H4970>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will you <S%H1413>gash<s%> yourself?

"Ah, <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H575>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will you not be <S%H8252>quiet<s%>? <S%H622>Withdraw<s%> into your <S%H8593>sheath;<s%> Be at <S%H7280>rest<s%> and <S%H1826>stay<s%> <S%H1826>still.<s%>

<S%H349>"How<s%> can it be <S%H8252>quiet,<s%> When the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>given<s%> it an <S%H6680>order<s%>? <S%H413>Against<s%> <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> and <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3220>seacoast<s%> <S%H2348><s%> â€“ <S%H8033>There<s%> He has <S%H3259>assigned<s%> it."
